sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_tourbuilder.TourBuilderMain</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Tour Builder Main class for all routing invocations

</description>
        <name>TourBuilderMain</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TourBuilderMain = Class.create();
TourBuilderMain.prototype = {
	
	_tbd : new TourBuilderDetails(),
	_tbu : new TourBuilderUtility(),
	
    initialize: function() {
    },

	process: function(payload) {
		if (!payload || payload == "null")
            return "invalid input.";

        var args = new global.JSON().decode(payload);
        var action = args.action;
		
		gs.debug('tourId: '+args.tour_id+', action: '+ args.action);
		
        if (action == 'tourdetails') {
            try {
                if(this._tbu.isValidTour(args.tour_id)){
					var gtbRecordingDisabled = gs.getProperty('sn_tourbuilder.gtb.disable.gtb.recording','true');
					return {id :args.tour_id,options:"",steps : this._tbd.getTourDetails(args),"gtbPlaybackDisabled":gtbRecordingDisabled=="true"};
				} else{
					var msg = gs.getMessage("Inactive or Invalid tour");
					return {"status" : "error", "message" : msg + " : " + args.tour_id};
				}
            } catch(e1) {
                return {"status" : "error", "message" : e1};
            }
        } else{
            return "Invalid action";
        }
	},
	
    type: 'TourBuilderMain'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-12-28 16:31:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0183ae22932012001aa1f4b8b67ffba5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TourBuilderMain</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Guided Tour Designer" source="sn_tourbuilder">97515a49134b5200ed373d62f244b04a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Guided Tour Designer">97515a49134b5200ed373d62f244b04a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0183ae22932012001aa1f4b8b67ffba5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-01-18 13:54:34</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
